name: Genesis (NSFW 18+)
description:
Hi and welcome, I'm Solensis, and I'm the developer of this Story-Driven Visual Novel.

What is Genesis ?
Genesis is a story-driven visual-novel made with Honey Select and Ren'py. It features a huge lore, a big new world and an impressive and captivating storyline full of differents characters !

What is the Story ?
You are a young man trying to live a simple life with your best friend until a tragedy strikes you! Now, you find yourself in another world, caught up in a divine war in order to have your wish come true! What will happen to you during this epic adventure? Will you go forth and unravel the mysteries of this new world? Or will you fall into despair? Only time and the choices you make will tell!

Questions and Answers :

Q1: How often will you deliver new updates ?
A1: For now, I am working on the game in my spare time since I have a day-job. But I think that when the community will grow, I'll have Patreon pools in order for the players to choose if they want more short updates or less long updates.

Q2: Do you speak English ?
A2: I'm not a native English speaker. My English is pretty simple but I think it's understandable. But I now have a native english-speaker who is proofreading the game for me
